docs.text: 欢迎来到 blog 。 更改博客在本地的颜色主题 Primary colors 主色 默认 blue 点击色块可更换主题的主色 Red Pink Purple Deep Purple Indigo Blue Light Blue Cyan Teal Green Light Green Lime Yellow Amber Orange Deep Orange Brown Grey Blue Grey White var buttons = document.querySelectorAll("button[data-md-color-primary]"); Array.prototype.forEach.call(buttons, function(button) { button.addEventListener("click", function() { document.body.dataset.mdColorPrimary = this.dataset.mdColorPrimary; localStorage.setItem("data-md-color-primary",this.dataset.mdColorPrimary); }) }) Accent colors 辅助色 默认 red 点击色块更换主题的辅助色 Red Pink Purple Deep Purple Indigo Blue Light Blue Cyan Teal Green Light Green Lime Yellow Amber Orange Deep Orange var buttons = document.querySelectorAll("button[data-md-color-accent]"); Array.prototype.forEach.call(buttons, function(button) { button.addEventListener("click", function() { document.body.dataset.mdColorAccent = this.dataset.mdColorAccent; localStorage.setItem("data-md-color-accent",this.dataset.mdColorAccent); }) })
docs.title: Getting Started
更改博客在本地的颜色主题

docs.text: 默认 blue 点击色块可更换主题的主色 Red Pink Purple Deep Purple Indigo Blue Light Blue Cyan Teal Green Light Green Lime Yellow Amber Orange Deep Orange Brown Grey Blue Grey White var buttons = document.querySelectorAll("button[data-md-color-primary]"); Array.prototype.forEach.call(buttons, function(button) { button.addEventListener("click", function() { document.body.dataset.mdColorPrimary = this.dataset.mdColorPrimary; localStorage.setItem("data-md-color-primary",this.dataset.mdColorPrimary); }) })
docs.title: Primary colors 主色

docs.text: 默认 red 点击色块更换主题的辅助色 Red Pink Purple Deep Purple Indigo Blue Light Blue Cyan Teal Green Light Green Lime Yellow Amber Orange Deep Orange var buttons = document.querySelectorAll("button[data-md-color-accent]"); Array.prototype.forEach.call(buttons, function(button) { button.addEventListener("click", function() { document.body.dataset.mdColorAccent = this.dataset.mdColorAccent; localStorage.setItem("data-md-color-accent",this.dataset.mdColorAccent); }) })
docs.title: Accent colors 辅助色
